dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3833281N] Notice of illegal copyright files hosted on your web serve
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Friday, April 13, 2007 7:59 AM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3833281N] Notice of illegal copyright files hosted on your web servers ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Notice of illegal copyright files hosted on your web servers Added by system at Friday, Apr 13 2007 12:58 pm X-MailFrom: alan@epemag.demon.co.uk X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Fri Apr 13 12:58:22 2007 Received: (qmail 10944 invoked by alias); 13 Apr 2007 17:58:22 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 10941 invoked from network); 13 Apr 2007 17:58:22 -0000 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 13 Apr 2007 17:58:22 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 13 Apr 2007 12:58:22 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Fri, 13 Apr 2007 12:58:22 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from alan@epemag.demon.co.uk) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HcQ2Q-0001aU-4Z for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 13 Apr 2007 12:58:22 -0500 Received: from outmail128173.authsmtp.co.uk ([62.13.128.173]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from alan@epemag.demon.co.uk) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HcQ2F-0004FC-QB for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 13 Apr 2007 12:58:12 -0500 Received: from outmail128177.authsmtp.com (outmail128177.authsmtp.com [62.13.128.177]) by punt3.authsmtp.com (8.13.8/8.13.8/Kp) with ESMTP id l3DHw6g4066014; Fri, 13 Apr 2007 18:58:06 +0100 (BST) Received: from net30.nowhere.co.uk (88-110-20-254.dynamic.dsl.as9105.com [88.110.20.254]) (authenticated bits=0) by mail.authsmtp.com (8.13.8/8.13.8/Kp) with ESMTP id l3DHw3eF074519; Fri, 13 Apr 2007 18:58:04 +0100 (BST) Message-Id: <200704131758.l3DHw3eF074519@mail.authsmtp.com> Disposition-Notification-To: X-Mailer: QUALCOMM Windows Eudora Version 7.1.0.9 X-Priority: 1 (Highest) Date: Fri, 13 Apr 2007 18:57:34 +0100 To: abuse@theplanet.com From: Alan Winstanley Subject: Notice of illegal copyright files hosted on your web servers Cc: "EPE Editorial Dept." , "Dean Hudson" Mime-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="=====================_14772468==.ALT" X-Antivirus: avast! (VPS 000733-1, 13/04/2007), Outbound message X-Antivirus-Status: Clean X-Server-Quench: 875b6fb0-e9e8-11db-a443-001185d377ca X-AuthRoute: OCdyZA4XBVZcSA0c Ii4cASpJRkMpKxhL B1kIKk1HI0wMSABN M15eIxoIcUtFHhZw QyQUWVRUV01wUWlw YwBRaEtValRPXgV0 UkhXQFdWCwdtHhxP Wh1qKl5xInNGf3p1 ZE8sX3JcWUI0fUF4 EEgCR20bMG41YH0e URQKalJQdABXfh9E a1h6AHAKZjZWKAQ/ Aw44Mng2M31eLCBY TQgJZVkVWVcRHzE8 W1gMHDEiBgUFQD4v IhBuLVhUDUEMKA0t PFFpQl8CLRIIEWUg X-Authentic-SMTP: 61633134363236.squirrel.dmpriest.net.uk:556/Kp X-Report-SPAM: If SPAM / abuse - report it at: http://www.authsmtp.com/abuse X-Virus-Status: No virus detected - but ensure you scan with your own anti-virus system! X-OriginalArrivalTime: 13 Apr 2007 17:58:22.0425 (UTC) FILETIME=[53790C90:01C77DF5] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Dear Sirs We are Wimborne Publishing Ltd, UK publishers of the magazine Everyday Practical Electronics ("EPE") More details of our magazine at www.epemag.wimborne.co.uk and our USA partners are at www.epemag.com We have been notified of the following web site which is hosting illegal copies of our copyrighted magazine files in PDF format. http://www.arunalab.com/pub/EBooks/ --> EPE This has been traced via FTP links posted into the following piracy / sharing forum: http://www.sonsivri.com/forum/index.php?topic=1896.135 www.arunalab.com appears to belong to an innocent medical practitioners in India, and we consider that the web site is probably being hijacked and used without their consent in order to distribute our copyrighted files. We have been unable to contact the web site owners or the Domain Registrar (Public Domain Registry) or the nameserver hosts. However a traceroute of www.arunalab.com highlights Theplanet.com as the web hosts: Trace arunalab.com; Start time 04/13/07 18:36:42 Tracing route to 74.52.30.10 50 bytes from 74.52.30.10: time=193 ms Hop Avg Diff Address 1 0 0 192.168.2.1 2 40 40 212.74.111.239 lo99.lon-x-ips.as9105.net 3 43 3 80.40.119.170 Gi1-0-6-70.lon11.as9105.net 4 57 14 213.200.77.73 ge-4-0-0.lon11.ip.tiscali.net 5 64 7 213.200.81.145 so-0-0-0.ams11.ip.tiscali.net 6 57 -7 195.69.144.36 ge-0.ams-ix.amstnl02.nl.bb.verio.net 7 169 112 129.250.3.252 p64-1-1-0.r20.asbnva01.us.bb.gin.ntt.net 8 168 -1 129.250.2.17 ae-0.r21.asbnva01.us.bb.gin.ntt.net 9 173 5 129.250.5.24 p64-1-1-0.r20.dllstx09.us.bb.gin.ntt.net 10 291 118 129.250.3.122 xe-1-1.r03.dllstx09.us.bb.gin.ntt.net 11 163 -128 157.238.225.6 xe-4-4.r03.dllstx09.us.ce.gin.ntt.net 12 165 2 70.87.253.6 te9-1.dsr01.dllstx3.theplanet.com 13 167 2 70.87.253.114 72.fd.5746.static.theplanet.com 14 187 20 12.96.160.18 po1.car01.dllstx6.theplanet.com 15 169 -18 74.52.30.10 a.1e.344a.static.theplanet.com End time 04/13/07 18:36:56 host reached We therefore ask for your co-operation by implementing your Abuse Policy against the web site in question, in order to ensure that the offending files are removed from the server. We confirm that Wimborne Publishing Ltd owns the worldwide copyright of all its material and copying or uploading onto third party servers is in breach of our copyright. We hope you will be able to assist us in removing the offending material and we thank you in advance for your early assistance. We would be grateful if you would confirm your position as soon as possible. Regards A R Winstanley EPE Magazine UK Online Editor -- Alan Winstanley EPE Magazine Online Editor email alan@epemag.demon.co.uk web www.epemag.co.uk This communication is intended only for the use of the Company and/or person(s) ("The intended recipient(s)") to whom it is addressed. You may not forward it to any other Party without the writer's permission. It may contain information which is privileged and confidential within the meaning of applicable law. It may also contain technical information or comments that are for guidance only which should not be deemed to be a considered opinion. If you are not the intended recipient, please contact the sender as soon as possible. MIME element (text/html) Dear Sirs

We are Wimborne Publishing Ltd, UK publishers of the magazine Everyday Practical Electronics ("EPE")
More details of our magazine at www.epemag.wimborne.co.uk  and our USA partners are at www.epemag.com

We have been notified of the following web site which is hosting illegal copies of our copyrighted magazine files in PDF format.

http://www.arunalab.com/pub/EBooks/  --> EPE

This has been traced via FTP links posted into the following piracy / sharing forum:

http://www.sonsivri.com/forum/index.php?topic=1896.135


www.arunalab.com   appears to belong to an innocent medical practitioners in India, and we consider that the web site is probably being hijacked and used without their consent in order to distribute our copyrighted files.

We have been unable to contact the web site owners or the Domain Registrar (Public Domain Registry) or the nameserver hosts.

However a traceroute of www.arunalab.com   highlights Theplanet.com as the web hosts:

Trace arunalab.com; Start time 04/13/07 18:36:42
Tracing route to 74.52.30.10
50 bytes from 74.52.30.10: time=193 ms
Hop         Avg          Diff           Address
 1       0                0               192.168.2.1
 2       40               40              212.74.111.239  lo99.lon-x-ips.as9105.net
 3       43               3               80.40.119.170   Gi1-0-6-70.lon11.as9105.net
 4       57               14              213.200.77.73   ge-4-0-0.lon11.ip.tiscali.net
 5       64               7               213.200.81.145  so-0-0-0.ams11.ip.tiscali.net
 6       57               -7              195.69.144.36   ge-0.ams-ix.amstnl02.nl.bb.verio.net
 7       169              112             129.250.3.252   p64-1-1-0.r20.asbnva01.us.bb.gin.ntt.net
 8       168              -1              129.250.2.17    ae-0.r21.asbnva01.us.bb.gin.ntt.net
 9       173              5               129.250.5.24    p64-1-1-0.r20.dllstx09.us.bb.gin.ntt.net
10       291              118             129.250.3.122   xe-1-1.r03.dllstx09.us.bb.gin.ntt.net
11       163              -128            157.238.225.6   xe-4-4.r03.dllstx09.us.ce.gin.ntt.net
12       165              2               70.87.253.6     te9-1.dsr01.dllstx3.theplanet.com
13       167              2               70.87.253.114   72.fd.5746.static.theplanet.com
14       187              20              12.96.160.18    po1.car01.dllstx6.theplanet.com
15       169              -18             74.52.30.10     a.1e.344a.static.theplanet.com
End time 04/13/07 18:36:56
host reached


We therefore ask for your co-operation by implementing your Abuse Policy against the web site in question, in order to ensure that the offending files are removed from the server. We confirm that Wimborne Publishing Ltd owns the worldwide copyright of all its material and copying or uploading onto third party servers is in breach of our copyright.

We hope you will be able to assist us in removing the offending material and we thank you in advance for your early assistance. We would be grateful if you would confirm your position as soon as possible.

Regards

A R Winstanley
EPE Magazine UK Online Editor


--
Alan Winstanley  EPE Magazine Online Editor

web www.epemag.co.uk
